title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-1.4 - Consideration of income and resources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-1.4 - Consideration of income and resources

State Regulations

In determining the income and resources of applicants
for and recipients of RCA, the following may not be considered by a social
services district: (a) any resources
remaining in the applicant's country of origin; (b) a sponsor's income and resources solely
because the person is serving as a sponsor; and
(c) any cash grant received by the applicant
under the United States Department of State or Department of Justice Reception
and Placement Programs. This type of cash grant is made available during the
first 30 days from the date of entry into the United States. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
373-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
